title: Thai Avenue
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Thai, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu Includes many (about 20) vegan dishes, which are clearly labeled on menu in restaurant; online menu denotes them as vegetarian. In addition to offering tofu as a meat-substitute, they have a vegetable option where they add tons of fresh veggies to your dish. As of Jan 2016, Holland has very few restaurants that offer vegan dishes. Also has gluten free and soy free menu items.
